English: {0} to Type, {1} Hold to Talk, {2} for Map, {3} for Coms
Description:
This is a helper text for the in-game chat. "{0}" represents the designated key for starting to type chat messages.  "{1}" represents the designated key for starting to speak over voice chat. 
"{2}" represents the designated key for showing the in game map,  "{3}" represents the designated key for showing a Communications menu. 

Coms is short for Communications

French.Translation: {0} pour écrire, {1} (maintenir) pour parler, {2} pour ouvrir la carte, {3} pour communiquer

Italian.Translation: {0} per digitare, {1} mantieni per parlare, {2} per mappa, {3} per comunicare

German.Translation: {0} zum Tippen, {1} halten zum Sprechen, {2} für die Karte, {3} für die Kommandoliste

Spanish.Translation: {0} para escribir, mantén pulsado {1} para hablar, {2} para mapa, {3} para comunicarse

Russian.Translation: {0}, чтобы написать; удерживайте {1}, чтобы сказать; {2} — карта; {3} — команды

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: {0} para digitar, {1} segure para falar, {2} para o mapa, {3} para as frases

Polish.Translation: Naciśnij {0}, aby pisać; Przytrzymaj {1}, aby mówić; Mapa {2}; Komunikaty {3}

Japanese.Translation: {0} でタイプ、 {1} 長押しで通話、 {2} でマップ、 {3} で定型文

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: {0}打字，{1}按住可說話，{2}顯示地圖，{3}顯示通訊

name: GameEventLog.A_Type_B_Talk_C_Map_D_Comms
